alternate_traits.name: Easily Augmented
alternate_traits.description: Androids with this trait can install one additional cybernetic augmentation into a system that already has an augmentation.

alternate_traits.name: Emotionless
alternate_traits.description: Androids with this trait don't take penalties to Disguise checks to appear as a different race or type when disguising as a human.

alternate_traits.name: Dual Talent
alternate_traits.description: Humans with this trait gain +2 to two ability scores of their choice instead of +2 to one.

alternate_traits.name: Adoptive Parentage
alternate_traits.description: Humans with this trait gain weapon familiarity and languages of another race.

alternate_traits.name: Stone Strider
alternate_traits.description: Kasathas with this trait move through rocky terrain at normal speed and without difficulty.

alternate_traits.name: Psychic Receptivity
alternate_traits.description: You gain a +2 racial bonus to Bluff, Diplomacy, and Sense Motive checks.

alternate_traits.name: Mental Fortress
alternate_traits.description: Shirrens with this trait gain a +2 racial bonus to saving throws against mind-affecting effects.

alternate_traits.name: Warrior Scholar
alternate_traits.description: Vesk with this trait gain a +2 racial bonus to one Profession skill of their choice.

alternate_traits.name: Quick Packer
alternate_traits.description: Ysoki with this trait can draw or stow items as a swift action.

alternate_traits.name: Stone Runner
alternate_traits.description: Kasathas with this trait can move through rocky difficult terrain at their normal speed.

alternate_traits.name: Thought Reading
alternate_traits.description: These lashuntas gain detect thoughts once per day as a spell-like ability.

alternate_traits.name: Mental Fortitude
alternate_traits.description: These lashuntas gain a +2 racial bonus to Will saving throws.

alternate_traits.name: Resistant Carapace
alternate_traits.description: Shirrens with this trait gain DR 1/— instead of their cooperative bonus.

alternate_traits.name: Terrifying Roar
alternate_traits.description: Vesk with this trait gain a racial bonus to Intimidate instead of saving throw bonuses.

alternate_traits.name: Tunnel Rat
alternate_traits.description: Ysoki with this trait gain bonuses to squeezing and moving through tight spaces.
